meanings.definition: The state of being whole or in good health.
meanings.sent1: Her haleness improved after she started exercising regularly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor was pleased with the patient's haleness after the successful surgery.
meanings.sent3: Despite his haleness, he still managed to catch a cold.
meanings.sent4: The haleness of the organization was crucial for its success.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the garden reflected the haleness of nature.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being complete or undivided.
meanings.sent1: The haleness of the puzzle was evident once all the pieces were in place.
meanings.sent2: The team's haleness was essential for achieving their goal.
meanings.sent3: The haleness of the cake was compromised when it fell on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The haleness of the friendship was tested during difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The haleness of the plan ensured its success without any hitches.
